entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
